ygData.subject: Re: Exploits
ygData.msgSnippet: this is not a reply to any specific *exploit* msg posted (i quit reading them after the first couple as i m not too interested in that type of gameplay... no
ygData.messageBody:
this is not a reply to any specific *exploit* msg posted (i quit reading
them after the first couple as i'm not too interested in that type of
gameplay... no offense intended). if anybody remembers me talking about the
*so called* exploit in south ro near the hill a couple of weeks ago, it has
been confirmed. i used it for about 5 kills a few weeks ago, and decided it
was a little too easy, and was a bannable offense (although i don't think i
went as far as to say it was an exploit, because it didn't *feel* like an
exploit). my friend, however, did not come to the same conclusion, and
continued to use it. well, mr. GM made a visit to her this past weekend,
and promptly told her that it WAS an exploit, and that her account would be
terminated if caught near the exploit area again fighting another monster.
he also told her that this warning was not only for that specific exploit,
but if he caught her char doing anything similiar to that in any other zone,
that her account would be terminated (so basically, the warning was not
specific to the exploit, but, rather specific to ANY exploit). One chance
and then ur outa here! but to each his/her own :)

just a heads up that Verant is actively aware of many exploits, and if you
get caught, you can be banned.

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek
